title: Bills’ McCoy, Watkins sit out vs. Giants
text:
Published By: Boston Herald Sports - Today 
Buffalo Bills coach Rex Ryan ruled out running back LeSean McCoy and receiver Sammy Watkins from playing against the New York Giants on Sund...
